description: A SolitaryVegetationObject represents individual vegetation objects, e.g. trees or bushes.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the SolitaryVegetationObject.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the SolitaryVegetationObject.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the SolitaryVegetationObject.

properties.name: species
properties.description: Indicates the botanical name of the SolitaryVegetationObject.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Distance between the highest point of the vegetation object and the lowest point of the terrain at the bottom of the object.

properties.name: trunkDiameter
properties.description: Specifies the diameter of the SolitaryCityObject''s trunk.

properties.name: crownDiameter
properties.description: Specifies the diameter of the SolitaryCityObject''s crown.

properties.name: rootBallDiameter
properties.description: Specifies the diameter of the SolitaryCityObject''s root ball.

properties.name: maxRootBallDepth
properties.description: Specifies the vertical distance between the lowest point of the SolitaryVegetationObject''s root ball and the terrain surface.

properties.name: lod1Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the SolitaryVegetationObject in Level of Detail 1. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod2Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the SolitaryVegetationObject in Level of Detail 2. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod3Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the SolitaryVegetationObject in Level of Detail 3. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4Geometry
properties.description: Relates to a 3D geometry that represents the SolitaryVegetationObject in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4ImplicitRepresentation
properties.description: Relates to an implicit geometry that represents the SolitaryVegetationObject in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.
